options: Surpassing 15 million credit cards in circulation

The Russian-built multi-role stealth-guided missile frigate INS Tushil was commissioned into the Indian Navy at the Yantar Shipyard in Kaliningrad, Russia. What is unique about the construction of INS Tushil?
options: It is the first Indian-built stealth frigate.
It is the seventh ship of Project 1135.6, built under an India-Russia collaboration.
It is a nuclear-powered frigate built by Baltiysky Zawod.
It is the first ship constructed under the Atmanirbhar Bharat initiative.
It is the first ship to feature entirely indigenous weaponry.
answer: It is the seventh ship of Project 1135.6, built under an India-Russia collaboration.
